00023 #define HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H

00031 #include "Common/Mutex.h"

00037 #include "MaintenanceTask.h"
00038 #include "MaintenanceTaskIndexPurge.h"

00040 namespace Hypertable {
00041 
00044   class MaintenanceQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00045 
00046     static int              ms_pause;
00047     static boost::condition ms_cond;
00048 
00049     struct LtMaintenanceTask {
00050       bool
00051       operator()(const MaintenanceTask *sm1, const MaintenanceTask *sm2) const {
00052         int cmp = xtime_cmp(sm1->start_time, sm2->start_time);
00053         if (cmp == 0)
00054           return sm1->priority < sm2->priority;
00055         return xtime_cmp(sm1->start_time, sm2->start_time) >= 0;
00056       }
00057     };
00058 
00059     typedef std::priority_queue<MaintenanceTask *,
00060             std::vector<MaintenanceTask *>, LtMaintenanceTask> TaskQueue;
00061 
00062     class MaintenanceQueueState {
00063     public:
00064       MaintenanceQueueState() : shutdown(false) { return; }
00065       TaskQueue          queue;
00066       Mutex              mutex;
00067       boost::condition   cond;
00068       bool               shutdown;
00069       std::set<Range *>  pending;
00070       std::set<Range *>  in_progress;
00071     };
00072 
00073     class Worker {
00074 
00075     public:
00076 
00077       Worker(MaintenanceQueueState &state) : m_state(state) { return; }
00078 
00079       void operator()() {
00080         boost::xtime now, next_work;
00081         MaintenanceTask *task = 0;
00082 
00083         while (true) {
00084 
00085           {
00086             ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00087 
00088             boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00089 
00090             while (m_state.queue.empty() ||
00091                    xtime_cmp((m_state.queue.top())->start_time, now) > 0) {
00092 
00093               if (m_state.shutdown)
00094                 return;
00095 
00096               if (m_state.queue.empty())
00097                 m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00098               else {
00099                 next_work = (m_state.queue.top())->start_time;
00100                 m_state.cond.timed_wait(lock, next_work);
00101               }
00102               boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00103             }
00104 
00105             task = m_state.queue.top();
00106             m_state.queue.pop();
00107             m_state.pending.erase(task->get_range());
00108             m_state.in_progress.insert(task->get_range());
00109           }
00110 
00111           try {
00112 
00113             // maybe pause
00114             {
00115               ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00116               while (ms_pause)
00117                 ms_cond.wait(lock);
00118             }
00119 
00120             task->execute();
00121 
00122           }
00123           catch(Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00124             if (static_cast<MaintenanceTaskIndexPurge *>(task) == 0) {
00125               HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00126               if (task->retry()) {
00127                 ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00128                 HT_ERRORF("Maintenance Task '%s' failed, will retry in %u milliseconds ...",
00129                           task->description().c_str(), task->get_retry_delay());
00130                 boost::xtime_get(&task->start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00131                 task->start_time.sec += task->get_retry_delay() / 1000;
00132                 m_state.queue.push(task);
00133                 m_state.cond.notify_one();
00134                 continue;
00135               }
00136               HT_ERRORF("Maintenance Task '%s' failed, dropping task ...",
00137                         task->description().c_str());
00138             }
00139           }
00140 
00141           {
00142             ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00143             m_state.in_progress.erase(task->get_range());              
00144           }
00145 
00146           delete task;
00147         }
00148       }
00149 
00150     private:
00151       MaintenanceQueueState &m_state;
00152     };
00153 
00154     MaintenanceQueueState  m_state;
00155     ThreadGroup m_threads;
00156     int  m_workers;
00157     bool joined;
00158 
00159   public:
00160 
00167     MaintenanceQueue(int worker_count) : m_workers(worker_count), joined(false) {
00168       Worker Worker(m_state);
00169       assert (worker_count > 0);
00170       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00171         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00172       //threads
00173     }
00174 
00180     void shutdown() {
00181       m_state.shutdown = true;
00182       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00183     }
00184 
00189     void join() {
00190       if (!joined) {
00191         m_threads.join_all();
00192         joined = true;
00193       }
00194     }
00195 
00199     void stop() {
00200       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00201       ms_pause++;
00202     }
00203 
00207     void start() {
00208       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00209       HT_ASSERT(ms_pause > 0);
00210       ms_pause--;
00211       if (ms_pause == 0)
00212         ms_cond.notify_all();
00213     }
00214 
00218     void clear() {
00219       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00220       while (!m_state.queue.empty())
00221         m_state.queue.pop();
00222       m_state.pending.clear();
00223     }
00224 
00225     bool is_scheduled(Range *range) {
00226       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00227       if (m_state.pending.count(range) || m_state.in_progress.count(range))
00228         return true;
00229       return false;
00230     }
00231 
00239     void add(MaintenanceTask *task) {
00240       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00241       m_state.queue.push(task);
00242       m_state.pending.insert(task->get_range());
00243       m_state.cond.notify_one();
00244     }
00245 
00246     size_t workers() { return m_workers; }
00247 
00248     size_t pending() {
00249       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00250       return m_state.pending.size();
00251     }
00252   };
00253 
00254   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<MaintenanceQueue> MaintenanceQueuePtr;
00255 
00256 } // namespace Hypertable

00258 #endif // HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H
